  2. Welcome

Our range of expertise encompasses appliance diagnostics, appliance maintenance, appliance repair, and appliance installation services, covering a diverse array of residential and commercial appliances across Orange County, CA. Whether it's refrigerators, freezers, ice makers, washers, dryers, ranges, stoves, ovens, cook-tops, wine coolers, microwaves, dishwashers, garbage disposals, or BBQs, we have you covered. We work with all brands, including but not limited to Samsung, Whirlpool, KitchenAid, Bosch, Frigidaire, Maytag, Sub-Zero, Subzero, Kenmore, General Electric, GE, LG, Liebherr, JennAir, Dacor, Thermador, Fisher & Paykel, Viking, Whirlpool, Whirlpool, and numerous others. With Same Day Appliance Repair, you can trust that your appliances are in capable hands. Appliance repair is our expertise, entrusted to our team of skilled professionals. With extensive experience under their belt, our technicians deliver the highest quality repair service. Ensuring Compatibility and Performance Providing professional appliance repair service, we are commitment to quality appliance repair services doesn't stop at just stocking parts; we also ensure that each component precisely matches the specifications of your refrigerator's brand and model. This meticulous attention to compatibility means that when we repair your appliance, it's done with parts that are designed to work seamlessly with your specific unit. This approach not only enhances the efficiency of your refrigerator but also helps preserve its original functionality and aesthetics. By choosing parts that align perfectly with the manufacturer's design, we ensure that your refrigerator continues to operate as efficiently as on the day you bought it. How to Schedule Same-Day Appointment For Appliance Repair in Los Angeles and Surrounding Areas and What to Expect How to Contact Us Contacting us directly via the phone is the most efficient method to arrange your same-day service appointment. You can also book your appointment online and specify the details of the appointment such as the brand of your appliance, a specific issue, date, and time. Service Fee Cost and When Is It Waved We charge a service fee of $89 for Home appliances. Upon arrival, our technician will assess the issue and inform you of the total repair cost. This puts you in control, allowing you to decide whether to proceed with the repair. If you choose to go ahead with the repair, we will waive the initial service fee, and you'll only be responsible for the repair costs Our Hours Of Operation We answer the phone Monday through Saturday, 8 am to 8 pm, However, our technicians can be on-site at an earlier or a later hour including Sunday. Our team approaches each job with a positive, can-do attitude and therefore if your repairs need to be done on a Sunday, we can assist you as well. Cost Of The Appliance Repair Our repair process is grounded in transparency and integrity. We prioritize honesty and clear communication in every repair job. Our skilled technicians will thoroughly explain the nature of the problem with your appliance and provide a detailed repair quote upfront, ensuring there are no hidden charges. You may refer to the price list on our website to get an idea of what it might cost. While our price list offers a preliminary estimate, remember that only a qualified technician can accurately diagnose the issue with your appliance. Often, what a customer assumes to be the problem can turn out to be something completely different, ranging from a basic issue like a malfunctioning outlet to more complex problems like a faulty compressor.
